summary: Proof of concept for a GetCurrentHold() script function. Adds a spell to the player which displays the current hold as well as the player's coordinates. Only works in the Skyrim worldspace ("Tamriel")
descriptionHtml: Proof of concept for a GetCurrentHold() script function. Adds a spell to the player which displays the current hold as well as the player's coordinates. Only works in the Skyrim worldspace ("Tamriel")
author: Hypno
